DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pre-lens tear film stability DAILIES TOTAL1® silicone hydrogel daily disposable contact lenses two silicone hydrogel daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Pre-Lens Tear Film Performance Silicone Hydrogel Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Be legal age consent sign write Informed Consent document , legal age , write consent parent guardian participate . Require vision correction eye . Wear either daily disposable contact lenses weekly/monthly replacement contact lenses power 0.50 10.00 diopter , cylinder ≤0.75 diopter , ADD correction . Wear habitual contact lenses average 1214 hour per day , least 5 day per week . Willing able wear study contact lenses 16 hour per day . Able achieve visual acuity least 6/7.5 eye study lens . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Currently wear DAILIES TOTAL1® , 1DAY ACUVUE® TRUEYE™ , Clariti™ 1day contact lens . Require monovision correction . Any systemic ocular disease disorder ( refractive disorder allow dry eye permit ) , complicate factor , structural abnormality would negatively affect conduct outcome study . Ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month . Topical systemic antibiotic use within 7 day enrollment . Topical ocular systemic corticosteroid use within 14 day enrollment . Pregnant nursing woman . Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
